name: After Ate Hot Chocolate
description: This recipe is for one luxurious cup or two small servings. Double the recipe if there is a crowd.
preparation: Steep tea in water for 5 minutes and strain.
In a small saucepan, whisk together cocoa powder, sugar, and half of the brewed tea to make a smooth paste with no lumps.
Whisk in the milk and the remaining tea. Heat gently until hot, but do not boil.
Whisk in the bourbon or rum if using, and serve!
tips: For a little decadence, top with some marshmallows, whipped cream, or ice cream, and a dusting of Cinnamon or nutmeg.
